ComicInfo.Title: Cracked Cut Out Popularity Kit; If Political Figures Did TV Guest Shots...; The Ride of Paul Revere; Cracked Sympathy Cards; Great Women of History; Madison Avenue Shut-Ups; Is the Ink Blot Test Reliable?; Celebrity Cut-Out Stamps; The Face Upon the Floor; What Has Happened to Merchandising?; New Designs for Business Cards; Autobiographies of Animal Stars; King Arthur's Round Table; Lose Weight by Exercising Right on Your Job; Handwriting Analysis; If Different Comedians Played Shakespeare...; How Madison Avenue Can Make Unpopular Subjects Popular
ComicInfo.Summary:
British editions are identical to the US editions except for the price and cover date. The UK numbering includes Cracked Collectors' Editions.Various political figures appear on television shows. It becomes complicated when all three guests on 'To Tell the Truth' claim to be the premier of France.
Various comedians adapt Shakespearean plays to suit their comedy routines.
How to advertise subjects such as homework, income tax, the Army draft board and protection rackets.
